overview: Joyce Reid, a wealthy young debutante, stows away on a cargo ship to China, carrying as passengers her dashing aviator sweetheart, Dan Bailey and and her munitions-producing father, E. J. Reid and an assortment of the usual south-seas characters along with some Asians with varying agendas. The cargo included a shipment of bombs and machine guns. She soon finds herself being held hostage  and they will free her only if Dan agrees to pilot a bombing plane for some Chinese bandits.
tagline: Through a Hail of Lead to Reckless Romance!
title: Roaming Lady
